error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to WaterFurnace service

user.description: Enter your WaterFurnace Symphony account credentials.
user.title: Connect to WaterFurnace

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration, we could not connect to {integration_title}. Please check your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: WaterFurnace YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration, invalid authentication details were found. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_invalid_aut.title: WaterFurnace YAML configuration import failed

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.description: Configuring {integration_title} via YAML is deprecated and will be removed in a future release. While importing your configuration an unknown exception has been encountered. Please correct your YAML configuration and restart Home Assistant, or remove the {domain} key from your configuration and configure the integration via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_unknown.title: WaterFurnace YAML configuration import failed
